definition: a reflex that closes and opens the eyes rapidly, to briefly shut the eyes
details:
noun
- a reflex that closes and opens the eyes rapidly
= synonyms: blinking, winking, eye blink, wink, nictitation, nictation
verb
- to briefly shut the eyes
= example: to briefly shut the eyes
= synonyms: wink, nictitate, nictate
- to force to go away by blinking
= example: to force to go away by blinking
= synonyms: wink, blink away
- to gleam or glow intermittently
= example: to gleam or glow intermittently
= synonyms: flash, wink, winkle, twinkle
